mit-han-lab/radial-attention

Sparse attention for long video generation

Related repos

  • fast attention algorithm for transformers, boosts speed and memory efficiency
  • generates 4k cinematic videos from text or images
  • Analyzes videos using vision models and Whisper
  • Generates minutes-long videos from text and images
  • video diffusion model for text-to-video, image-to-video, extension, and transitions
  • diffusion model for upscaling real-world videos with text prompts
  • Toolkit for fine-tuning and training large language and vision models
  • open-source language and vision models with huge context window and hybrid attention
